Html:
In case you're using the Networking features, I just found out that the Lidgren library released on 10/16/2008 has some problems for client connection. It disconnects from the server for no reason after certain connection time. The latest release which is on 3/19/2009, does not have this problem, so if you're using Networking features with Lidgren library, I strongly recommend that you download the latest version of Lidgren and recompile Goblin XNA with the newer .dll.

Ohan
